data.title: Son of a Gun Movie starring Brenton Thwaites and Ewan McGregor
data.meta_description: Take a look to the first official poster of Son of a Gun, the upcoming action drama movie written and directed by Australiam Filmmaker Julius Avery and starring Brenton Thwaites and Ewan McGregor:
data.text:
Take a look to the first official poster of Son of a Gun, the upcoming action drama movie written and directed by Australiam Filmmaker Julius Avery and starring Brenton Thwaites and Ewan McGregor:

(Click on the poster to enlarge.)

SON OF A GUN

Plot:

“Locked up for a minor crime, 19 year old JR (Brenton Thwaites) quickly learns the harsh realities of prison life. Protection, if you can get it, is paramount. JR soon finds himself under the watchful eye of Australia’s most notorious criminal, Brendan Lynch (Ewan McGregor). But protection comes at a price. Lynch and his crew have plans for their young protegee. Upon release, JR must help secure Lynch’s freedom, staging a daring prison break. As a reward, he’s invited to join the crew as they plan a gold heist that promises to deliver millions. However, as things start to go wrong, a deadly game of cat and mouse ensues. JR finds himself unsure of whom he can trust and on a collision course with his former mentor.”

Prison is a lot like high school, but much worse!

We also have a few pictures from the film:

(Click on a picture to enlarge.)

If you’re wondering about the only woman on those pictures, that’s Alicia Vikander.
